\)")
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" repo create cancelamentos --public --source=. --remote=origin --push)

Bash(powershell -Command "$excel = New-Object -ComObject Excel.Application; $excel.Visible = $false; $workbook = $excel.Workbooks.Open\(''C:\\Users\\Admin\\Downloads\\claude ia\\Cancelamento_Inadimplencia 2026 \(1\).xlsx''\); $worksheet = $workbook.Sheets.Item\(1\); $csvPath = ''C:\\Users\\Admin\\Downloads\\claude ia\\cancelamento_temp.csv''; $worksheet.SaveAs\($csvPath, 6\); $workbook.Close\($false\); $excel.Quit\(\); Write-Host ''Convertido com sucesso''")
